Articles.Content:
***Note: This is all still WIP so it does looks sketchy.***

As the title says: These are minecraftized KSP models! 

First: a great thanks to those on the PixelPapercraft aka MinecraftPapercraft website for the advice and templates.

To Do

-Mod parts (MJ, KW ,Tantares being considered)

-All parts

Done

-1m Decoupler/Separator

-0.5m Decoupler/Separator

-RT-10

-FLT-400

-48-7s

I will build these IRL when I have time.

[![TR-18D_zpsdnb6i5ti.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/TR-18D_zpsdnb6i5ti.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/TR-18D_zpsdnb6i5ti.png.html)

[![RT-10_zpscitylgyl.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/RT-10_zpscitylgyl.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/RT-10_zpscitylgyl.png.html)

[![TR-18A_zpsnxuefsle.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/TR-18A_zpsnxuefsle.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/TR-18A_zpsnxuefsle.png.html)

[![miniCoupler_zpszlmy4kay.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/miniCoupler_zpszlmy4kay.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/miniCoupler_zpszlmy4kay.png.html)

[![48-7s_zpsqhpyomev.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/48-7s_zpsqhpyomev.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/48-7s_zpsqhpyomev.png.html)

I'll keep updating when I can.
Nice job man! Now all we need is a KSP mod for Minecraft...

> 
> Nice job man! Now all we need is a KSP mod for Minecraft...

Or a minecraft mod for KSP?

> 
> Or a minecraft mod for KSP?

How about a mod for ksp that add blocks (Essentially changing the game into starmade ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) )

> 
> How about a mod for ksp that add blocks (Essentially changing the game into starmade ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) )

There was one, but it died a long time ago. 0.13 I think.

> 
> Or a minecraft mod for KSP?

Easy. Just change the textures to 1/8th resolution.
